item.title: Analogue Super NT
item.description: I missed the release of Analogue’s original Nintendo emulator, but the Super Nintendo version is a more reasonable pricepoint. Rather than a software emulator of the original hardware, this is a hardware emulator/reproduction of the original SNES hardware in an Altera Cyclone FPGA. Analogue Super NT
